Jokes.Joke4: Do not be racist , be like Mario. He's an italian plumber, made by Japanese people, who speaks english, looks like a mexican, jumps like a black man, and grabs coins like a jew!
Jokes.Joke5: Q: What type of book has only characters and no story? A: A telephone book.
Jokes.Joke6: Blonde: "What does IDK stand for?" Brunette: "I don.t know." Blonde: "OMG, nobody does!"
